source: .toc-container[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{margin:1.5rem 0}.toc-mobile[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:block}.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:none}.toc-toggle-container[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{border-radius:8px;background:var(--color-surface);overflow:hidden}.toc-toggle-header[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:flex;align-items:center;gap:0.5rem;padding:0.75rem 1rem;width:100%;background:none;border:none;color:inherit;font-family:inherit;font-size:inherit;cursor:pointer;text-align:left;outline:none;-webkit-tap-highlight-color:transparent}.toc-toggle-icon[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{width:0;height:0;border-left:6px solid var(--color-text);border-top:5px solid transparent;border-bottom:5px solid transparent;transition:transform 0.3s ease;flex-shrink:0}.toc-toggle-container[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn][data-open=true] .toc-toggle-icon[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{transform:rotate(90deg)}.toc-toggle-title[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{flex:1;font-weight:600;font-size:0.95rem}.toc-toggle-wrapper[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:grid;grid-template-rows:0fr;transition:grid-template-rows 0.3s cubic-bezier(0.4,0,0.2,1)}.toc-toggle-container[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn][data-open=true] .toc-toggle-wrapper[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{grid-template-rows:1fr}.toc-toggle-inner[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{overflow:hidden}.toc-content[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:flex;flex-direction:column;gap:0.3rem}.toc-mobile[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn] .toc-content[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{padding:0.5rem 1rem 1rem 1.75rem}.toc-link[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{color:var(--color-text-muted);text-decoration:none;font-size:0.9rem;line-height:1.5;transition:color 0.2s ease;padding:0.2rem 0}.toc-link[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]:hover{color:var(--color-accent)}.toc-link[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn].active{color:var(--color-accent);font-weight:500}.toc-link-h3[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{padding-left:1rem;font-size:0.85rem}@media (min-width: 1280px){.toc-mobile[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:none}.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{display:block;position:fixed;right:max(1rem,calc((100vw - 680px) / 2 - 220px));top:6rem;width:200px;max-height:calc(100vh - 8rem);overflow-y:auto}.toc-sidebar[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{padding:1rem;background:var(--color-surface);border-radius:8px;border:1px solid var(--color-border)}.toc-title[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{font-size:0.95rem;font-weight:600;margin-bottom:0.75rem;color:var(--color-text)}.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn] .toc-content[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{padding:0}.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]::-webkit-scrollbar{width:4px}.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]::-webkit-scrollbar-track{background:transparent}.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]::-webkit-scrollbar-thumb{background:var(--color-border);border-radius:4px}}@media (min-width: 1400px){.toc-desktop[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{right:max(2rem,calc((100vw - 680px) / 2 - 260px));width:240px}}@media (pointer: coarse){.toc-toggle-header[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{padding:1rem;min-height:48px}.toc-link[data-astro-cid-xvrfupwn]{padding:0.4rem 0;min-height:44px;display:flex;align-items:center}}
